name: Sh*t, Where's My Poop?!
description:
Oh no! You lost your shit! But Dr. Cuthbert needs all five samples.  Do you remember in which 🚽 you left them? Find your poop and earn Shitcoins – FOR FREE on Android and macOS!

CAN YOU ACHIEVE THE IMPROBABLE HIGHSCORE OF 5?

Also available on Google Play: Sh*t, Where's My Poop?! (Created with Twine) Get your first guess right and earn 1 Shitcoin. If your second guess is correct, you earn 0.5 of a Shitcoin. If it’s your third guess, you still get 0.25 of a Shitcoin… But beware: Mr. Flush’s clock is ticking!

Check the Global Highscore List on my homepage! Follow me on Twitter!

Get your shit together, before Evil Mr. Flush claims it forever. Will you be able to get all five poop samples to Dr. Cuthbert in time and earn the impossible highscore of 5 Shitcoins?
